result:
**Summary of Phase 1-2 Implementation:**

**Phase 1: Setup (T001-T012) - COMPLETE**
- ✅ T001-T008: Added numeric tower type constants and constructors in `gc-types.lisp`:
  - Type indices: `+type-bignum+` (14), `+type-ratio+` (15), `+type-float+` (16), `+type-complex+` (17), `+type-limb-array+` (18)
  - Type constructors: `make-bignum-type`, `make-ratio-type`, `make-float-type`, `make-complex-type`, `make-limb-array-type`
  - Division-by-zero exception tag
  - Reference type handlers for binary emission

- ✅ T009-T012: Created test file structures:
  - `tests/integration/bignum-test.lisp`
  - `tests/integration/ratio-test.lisp`
  - `tests/integration/float-test.lisp`
  - `tests/integration/complex-test.lisp`

**Phase 2: Foundational (T013-T018) - COMPLETE**
- ✅ T013-T015: Implemented numeric type dispatch functions in `func-section.lisp`:
  - `emit-numeric-type-p` - checks if value is any numeric type
  - `emit-get-numeric-type` - returns type code (1-5)
  - `numeric-type-contagion` - determines result type per CLHS 12.1.4
  - Type coercion helpers: `emit-coerce-to-float`, `emit-coerce-to-complex`

- ✅ T016: Created contract tests in `tests/contract/numeric-types-test.lisp`

- ✅ T017: Added numeric literal parsing in `tokenizer.lisp` and `parser.lisp`:
  - Ratio literals: `1/2`, `-3/4`
  - Float literals: `1.5`, `1.5d0`, `1.5e10`
  - Complex literals: `#C(1 2)`

- ✅ T018: Verified all 42 existing tests pass

The foundational infrastructure is now in place. The next phases will implement the actual arithmetic operations for each numeric type (Phases 3-9).
